website_summaries.verdict: This puller weighs less than 10 pounds, but it delivers up to 4 tons of pulling power.
pros: Entire tool is constructed from steel, which means it will stand up to rough treatment nicely
Ships with a carrying case for maximum portability
Handle contains a comfort grip to ensure your hand doesn’t slip when applying the pressure
cons: Claims a 4-ton capacity, but its safe working load is only 2 tons

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time..... BUT
customer_reviews.text: It appears they took a 2 ton puller and added a bigger cable to sell it as a 4 ton puller. With the bigger cable there was no room for the cable to fit. Result was about one foot of pull. When you took up slack there was nothing left. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie G Stout

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made you get what you pay for in this.the release mechanism on mine right out of the box is missing a piece also the pulley hook does not rotate with cable however that might be there design friction must chew into it over time. I’ll update if anything changes
customer_reviews.author: Marcela

customer_reviews.title: Solidly Built
customer_reviews.text: This "come along" is great. Very heavy duty and solidly built. The only thing that surprised me is that there is only 2' 9" of travel given the large gauge cable and the small spool. I do not consider this a flaw, and it is listed in the product description (4' 8" length extended/1' 11" length contracted), but could have used a bit more reach.
customer_reviews.author: DBJ III

customer_reviews.title: Nearly lost a limb
customer_reviews.text: Day one of use: Catastrophic failure. Luckily I didn’t lose a hand or finger. I had rigged a parallel pull with two eye holes, trading loads between the two to reel in the cable. Strange how this 4 ton cable winch exploded, but the trailer tie down strap (rated at 3333lbs), (i.e. less that half the claimed load capacity of this product) on the other eye hole not only caught the break, but held. Notice in my picture how the cable is no longer attached to the reel.
customer_reviews.author: Mainer

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built and works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I just moved two 20' shipping containers with this device. I jacked them up (hydraulic) and put them on rollers made out of #10 cans filled with concrete and then used this beast to pull the containers in the direction I wanted to go. Couldn't have done this without it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Gradwohl

customer_reviews.title: Good construction, short pull
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, nice case, east to use, but a much shorter cable reach than expected. For short pulls this is a great tool, but long pulls you might want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McLoughlin

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use to help straighten a bumper on my truck that my other come along failed to do, this one had no trouble and it comes in a. Ice plastic case to carry and store it, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking quality
customer_reviews.text: I have only needed to use this one time so far but it worked as expected. The gears look better than any of the other four cable pullers I own. Comparing this to another 4 ton puller I have owned for years, this one looks to be made of better materials and it is really nice to have a custom fitted tool box to store it in and transport it. It also has the best handle/grip I have ever seen on a cable puller. Nice.....
customer_reviews.author: holyfire

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, needs larger spool
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to get my tractor, which was buried, unstuck. Took less than 5 minutes to figure out how to release the spool and how to engage/disengage the rachet mechanism. The short amount of take-up was a little frustrating, causing me to unhook, adjust straps, and rehook several times. everything worked perfectly for me and the handle was very comfortable. 4* because it needs a little larger spool.
customer_reviews.author: Casey W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made, used it to 40' shipping container a few feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool better than harbor freights brand
customer_reviews.text: It did a awesome job. I bought a harbor freight one and tried it but I ended up taking it back I probably got a couple hundred pounds on it and it broke. I bought this one to help me pull this tree down. I was cutting a tree down in the woods and it got hung up into another tree when it was falling down. Did an awesome job just took a while.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great. I've used it to pull 19 acres of farm wire. very well built for the price
customer_reviews.author: carlus garnette

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty means safety.
customer_reviews.text: I love the double ratchet as well the little latch that you press once and it continues to hold the cog away from the sprockets so I can release cable using two hands, one on the trigger and the other pulling on the come along handle. Much easier than the $30 dollar comealongs, and worth the extra $23. Heavy duty cable and construction.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Kerr

customer_reviews.title: This broke withing 15min of use
customer_reviews.text: My riding mower got stuck in the mud. Had a perfect setup and was excited to use new winch. However after 5 cranks, the wire got stuck in between a shield plate in cased in the gear. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Park

customer_reviews.title: very low quality product
customer_reviews.text: This thing was worthless. It broke the first time I used it. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: brad Rawe

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, saved my but a hand full of times getting my rav4 unstuck, would buy again
customer_reviews.author: LmpJThompson

customer_reviews.title: Jeep Saved from Slipping Off the Edge
customer_reviews.text: This did great when pulling my Wrangler off the edge as it was slipping at any movement. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: W. Douglas Silvester

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Tried to pull the cable out to use it and it wouldn't pull out.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Pulls everything with ease and come with a nice case to store it in, perfect tool for the money
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great when stabilizing trees for cutting. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s only got about 3 feet of cable on it
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty Come along but it’s only 3 feet long if that
customer_reviews.author: BeeredHemmy

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This has a quality feel and look. The heavy duty case jerps it clean and moisture free.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Starkey

customer_reviews.title: Tension Release
customer_reviews.text: I had difficulty from the first use to release the tension on this and now it absolutely will not release at all when under pressure making the unit worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: First one was defective so had to send it back and reorder, very fast process.
customer_reviews.author: Tony and Carol Stasuik

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my work truck and also holding down my trucker on the trailer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, and a nice case to keep it together and prevent it from hanging up on other tools.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of equipment, ive had a dozen come alongs and this is the best, it never binds and always releases.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to.
customer_reviews.text: This does what it needs to and has plenty of pulling power for what I needed it for. The ratchet mechanism on the winding drum is a little cheesy and the cable length is relatively short, but it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Vietzke

customer_reviews.title: Pulled a tree stump
customer_reviews.text: Well made and after you figure out how to operate it, it 's great.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Slesinski

customer_reviews.title: Easy pull.
customer_reviews.text: I pulled several large shrubs out of the ground. Did the job easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING DO NOT BUY!!!!!!The biggest "P.O.S." absolute junk! It broke during first use! If I could anything less than one star I would!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Powers

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Well made for this price and the added bonus of a very durable case that will keep it stored away when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN J KELLY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has used this multiple times and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Product sucks because I did not get what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: When package arrived, I had a box labeled TR industrial 4 ton Dual Gear Power Puller and inside was a 9 pound dead blow rubber hammer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok product work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Cable too short, very slow to process to unwind when in tension
customer_reviews.author: Frederic

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I used the 4 ton pull along to pull a tree stump out of the ground. It had the strength to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: jessie

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: this is perfect for straightening the walls on my pole barn
customer_reviews.author: DeanCallas

customer_reviews.title: great unit built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: built well but would like to use it as a 2 ton if the cable can be extended with single pull love it though
customer_reviews.author: gary c.

customer_reviews.title: strong metal ,very good condition,did the job.
customer_reviews.text: My husband was pleased with this item, that's about all i can say since i didn't handle it , he said it was just what he was looking for
customer_reviews.author: LindaJ.Maney

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks good, feels heavy duty. have not used it yet
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace one I tore up trying to straighten a trailer foot I had bent.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

product_meta.title: TR Industrial Portable 4-Ton Dual Gear Power Puller
product_meta.description: The TR Industrial Portable 4-Ton Dual Gear Power Puller is Ideal for off road vehicle recovery, loading heavy loads unto trailers, pulling fences, logs, rocks, and stumps. This portable power puller gives you 4 tons (8,000 lbs) of maximum pulling power and weights less than 10 lbs. It is up to 30% lighter than comparable pullers without skimping on the power. Built to last all steel frame and gears. Premium steel construction keeps the power puller resistant to wear and tear. High quality galvanized finish gives it excellent protection against weather and elements. Dual gear and dual locking pawl system distributes force evenly so you can enjoy easy and consistent pull. We use 1/4 in. aircraft-grade braided steel cable. Our 3/8 in. hooks are drop forged with safety latch. 18 in. high-leverage handle. We also designed a comfort grip that covers more than half of the handle (10.5 in.). You have more space to comfortably apply force and pull the load more easily. Hook to hook distance is 4 ft. 8 in. fully extended and 1 ft. 11 in. fully contracted. The maximum capacity is 4 tons (8,000 lbs) and a safe working load is 2 tons (4,000 lbs).
feature_bullets: This portable power puller gives you 4 tons (8,000 lbs) of maximum pulling power and weights less than 10 lbs. It is up to 30% lighter than comparable pullers without skimping on the power. A sturdy carry storage case is included. Easily store the power puller in your truck, trailer, workshop or garage. Ideal for off road vehicle recovery, loading heavy loads unto trailers, pulling fences, logs, rocks, and stumps

Built to last all steel frame and gears. Premium steel construction keeps the power puller resistant to wear and tear. High quality galvanized finish gives it excellent protection against weather and elements

Dual gear and dual locking pawl system distributes force evenly so you can enjoy easy and consistent pull. We use 1/4 in. aircraft-grade braided steel cable. Our 3/8 in. hooks are drop forged with safety latch and fits up to 1/2 in. chains
18 in. high-leverage handle. We also designed a comfort grip that covers more than half of the handle (10.5 in.). You have more space to comfortably apply force and pull the load more easily
Hook to hook distance is 4 ft. 8 in. fully extended and 1 ft. 11 in. fully contracted. The maximum capacity is 4 tons (8,000 lbs) and a safe working load is 2 tons (4,000 lbs)
